long_description: Designed for workouts in warm weather, the women's Marmot Interval Tank Top is lightweight, protects your skin from UV rays and offers light support with its built-in bra. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking polyester fabric helps keep your skin protected from harsh UV light with a UPF rating of 30; elastane adds stretch. 3-piece, internal shelf bra offers light support. Mesh fabric panels in both bra and tank top enhance breathability. Flatlock seams reduce chafing, and tag-free neckline won't irritate skin. Reflective highlights enhance visibility in dim light. The Marmot Interval Tank Top offers a next-to-skin, athletic fit with a racerback.
short_description: Designed for workouts in warm weather, the women's Marmot Interval Tank Top is lightweight, protects your skin from UV rays and offers light support with its built-in bra.
